incident_updates.body:
• 2013-05-11 21:48:47 - We're investigating an exception spike.
  • 2013-05-11 21:57:49 - We've taken a misbehaving fileserver pair offline to perform maintenance.
  • 2013-05-12 00:11:52 - We're still performing maintenance on several fileserver clusters. Some repositories are currently unavailable.
  • 2013-05-12 03:29:48 - We've restored access to all but 3% of repositories and continue our work to restore service completely.
  • 2013-05-12 06:00:07 - We are still performing maintenance on ~0.2% of repositories.
  • 2013-05-12 06:41:03 - The 3% of repositories previously affected are temporarily unavailable again.
  • 2013-05-12 08:37:07 - We're continuing to perform maintenance on ~0.18% of repositories.
  • 2013-05-12 14:49:16 - Work is continuing to restore access to the affected repositories. Please accept our sincere apologies for the lengthy service impact.
  • 2013-05-12 16:07:03 - We're performing some final verification checks on the affected fileserver and plan to bring it online shortly.
  • 2013-05-12 16:55:46 - All repositories are now available.

components.name: Git Operations
components.description: Performance of git clones, pulls, pushes, and associated operations
